places365_project.pipelines.model_evaluation package¶

This is a boilerplate pipeline ‘model_training’ generated using Kedro 0.17.7

places365_project.pipelines.model_evaluation.create_pipeline()[source]¶

Pipeline

Submodules¶

places365_project.pipelines.model_evaluation.nodes module¶

places365_project.pipelines.model_evaluation.nodes.load_model_and_data(model_path, input_dir, batch_size, num_workers, model_checkpoint)[source]¶

Loads neural network for solving classification problem on Places365 dataset

Parameters

  • model_path (str) – Path to the model.

  • input_dir (str) – Path to the split dataset.

  • batch_size (int) – Number of images in a batch.

  • num_workers (int) – How many subprocesses are used for data loading.

  • model_checkpoint (str) – name of model checkpoint

Returns

Model object alongside train, validation, test data loaders

Return type

Tuple[PlacesModel, torch.utils.data.DataLoader]

places365_project.pipelines.model_evaluation.nodes.test_model(model, test_dataset, result_path, figsize)[source]¶

Trains the model

Parameters

  • model (PlacesModel) – Model object created with initialize()

  • test_dataset (DataLoader) – DataLoader of test dataset.

  • result_path (str) – Path where the resulting confusion matrix will be stored

  • figsize (int) – Size of confusion matrix image

Returns

Accuracy of the model on the test dataset and confusion matrix

Return type

Tuple[int, np.array]
